name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CodeView: VS Code plugin for Github

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check out your github repositories in IDE mode.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CodeView seamlessly transforms your GitHub experience by bringing the Visual Studio Code's layout directly to your browser. With this extension, users can directly switch to an IDE mode on GitHub repositories, enabling them to view and navigate code repositories with the same ease and functionality they enjoy in VS Code (or IntelliJ or any other IDE).

Key Features:

- IDE Mode: Enter a dedicated IDE mode within GitHub to experience a VS Code-like environment.
- Repository Navigation: Browse through files and directories in the repository effortlessly.
- Code Viewing: View code directly in the right panel, just like in an IDE.
- Familiar Interface: Enjoy a familiar and intuitive interface that mimics the layout of an IDE.
- Enhanced Productivity: Improve your workflow by accessing powerful code navigation and viewing tools without leaving your browser.

This extension is perfect for developers who frequently use GitHub and want to streamline their workflow directly within GitHub pages. The extension provides a seamless and enhanced development experience.
